channel.title: Unity on jacks portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Unity on jacks portfolio

item.title: Intervallic
item.description: A video game for music students designed to reduce burnout and make practice fun. Now available on Steam!

item.title: Willow's Quest
item.description: A cat’s adventure to find their little gelatin friend. Features a nonlinear questing system and turn-based combat.

item.title: chefhunt
item.description: A 3D horror escape game rendered with PS1-style graphics. Bake the perfect cake or die trying.

item.title: VastWaste & Mind The Debris
item.description: A VR based art installation showcasing the detrimental effects of space and marine debris. Featured at ISEA2022, SIGGRAPH, and Piksel Festival!
